entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
